document_data.caption: A jar of maple sap
document_data.name: Maple sap
document_data.mainbody: '''Maple sap''', was tree sap produced by [[maple|maple tree]]s.
document_data.Description: This substance had a sticky consistency and was edible.
document_data.Availability: * [[Bolden Coarsca]], a merchant in the [[Seven Suns Coster Market]], sold [[jar]]s of maple sap at a price of 54 [[copper piece]]s.
document_data.Usages:
* Maple sap could be refined to produce a type of sugar.
* Some ingested maple sap as a drink. Urban worshipers of [[Silvanus]] often sold it as such in an attempt to attract followers to [[Church of Silvanus|the church]].<ref name = "F&P-p146">
* Some used maple sap as an ingredient for creating [[potion of accuracy|''potions of accuracy'']].
* In the [[Sword Coast]], this sap was often used as a sweetener.
document_data.Trivia: Just a small amount of this substance could make a [[dohwar]] drunk.
